text: ninkal allahvaiyanri veru evarkalai(k katavularkalaka) alaikkinrirkalo avarkalai vanankak kutatenru nan niccayamaka tatukkappattu ullen" (enru napiye!) Nir kuruviraka"unkalutaiya mana iccaikalai nan pinparra matten; (nan appatic ceytal) nan niccayamaka vali tavari vituven; melum nan nervali perravarkalilum irukkamatten" enrum (napiye!) Nir kuruviraka
